title: Inland colonial investment - LIP 122
details: LIP-122 Far from the noise and chaos of the main road and surrounded by a small village and paddy fields, this stunning colonial house and property has so much to offer and could be restored to its former glory. Situated 2km inland this 200 Perch property has a lush tropical garden abundant with fruit trees such as passion fruit, mango and avocado, pepper, clove and cinnamon. The property uses the good private well for water the supply which provides water year-round it also has city water connection and electricity. The two-story house consists of 5 rooms, living room, bathroom, kitchen and store room. 21 km drive to Galle Fort and 3 km to the nearest beach.
